title: Function: __init__
content:
import random
import time

# ğŸ¥Š Karakter SÄ±nÄ±fÄ±: DÃ¶vÃ¼ÅŸÃ§Ã¼lerimizi tanÄ±mlayalÄ±m!
class Fighter:
    def __init__(self, name, health, attack_power_min, attack_power_max):
        self.name = name
        self.health = health
        self.attack_power_min = attack_power_min
        self.attack_power_max = attack_power_max

    def attack(self, opponent):
        # Rastgele bir hasar miktarÄ± belirle
        damage = random.randint(self.attack_power_min, self.attack_power_max)
        opponent.health -= damage # Rakibin canÄ±nÄ± azalt
        
        print(f"ğŸ’¥ {self.name}, {opponent.name} adlÄ± rakibine {damage} hasar verdi!")
        print(f"â¤ï¸ {opponent.name} kalan canÄ±: {opponent.health}")
        time.sleep(1) # OlaylarÄ± daha iyi takip etmek iÃ§in kÄ±sa bir bekleme

    def is_defeated(self):
        return self.health <= 0 # CanÄ± 0 veya altÄ±na dÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼ mÃ¼?

# ğŸ® Oyun BaÅŸlangÄ±cÄ±: DÃ¶vÃ¼ÅŸÃ§Ã¼lerimizi oluÅŸturalÄ±m!
print("â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•—")
print("â•‘         PYFIGHTER: DÃ–VÃœÅ ZAMANI!        â•‘")
print("â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•")
print("\nKarakterlerini seÃ§!")

# KullanÄ±cÄ±dan isimleri alalÄ±m
player1_name = input("Birinci dÃ¶vÃ¼ÅŸÃ§Ã¼nÃ¼n adÄ±: ") or "Kahraman"
player2_name = input("Ä°kinci dÃ¶vÃ¼ÅŸÃ§Ã¼nÃ¼n adÄ±: ") or "Canavar"

# DÃ¶vÃ¼ÅŸÃ§Ã¼leri yarat
fighter1 = Fighter(player1_name, 100, 10, 25) # Can: 100, Hasar: 10-25
fighter2 = Fighter(player2_name, 120, 8, 20) # Can: 120, Hasar: 8-20 (biraz daha dayanÄ±klÄ± ama daha az hasar)

print(f"\nâš¡ DÃ¶vÃ¼ÅŸ baÅŸlÄ±yor: {fighter1.name} ({fighter1.health} HP) vs {fighter2.name} ({fighter2.health} HP) âš¡\n")
time.sleep(2)

# âš”ï¸ DÃ¶vÃ¼ÅŸ DÃ¶ngÃ¼sÃ¼: CanlarÄ± bitene kadar devam!
turn = 0
while not fighter1.is_defeated() and not fighter2.is_defeated():
    turn += 1
    print(f"\n--- TUR {turn} ---")

    # Ä°lk dÃ¶vÃ¼ÅŸÃ§Ã¼ saldÄ±rÄ±r
    fighter1.attack(fighter2)
    if fighter2.is_defeated():
        break # EÄŸer ikinci dÃ¶vÃ¼ÅŸÃ§Ã¼ yenildiyse dÃ¶ngÃ¼yÃ¼ kÄ±r

    # Ä°kinci dÃ¶vÃ¼ÅŸÃ§Ã¼ saldÄ±rÄ±r
    fighter2.attack(fighter1)
    if fighter1.is_defeated():
        break # EÄŸer birinci dÃ¶vÃ¼ÅŸÃ§Ã¼ yenildiyse dÃ¶ngÃ¼yÃ¼ kÄ±r

# ğŸ† Oyun Sonu: KazananÄ± ilan edelim!
print("\n--- DÃ–VÃœÅ SONU ---")
if fighter1.is_defeated():
    print(f"ğŸ‰ {fighter2.name} kazandÄ±! {fighter1.name} nakavt oldu. ğŸ‰")
elif fighter2.is_defeated():
    print(f"ğŸ‰ {fighter1.name} kazandÄ±! {fighter2.name} nakavt oldu. ğŸ‰")
else:
    print("Hmm, bir ÅŸeyler ters gitti. DÃ¶vÃ¼ÅŸ berabere mi kaldÄ±? ğŸ¤”") # Bu kÄ±sma normalde dÃ¼ÅŸmemeli
